code: import{useEffect}from"react";import{useAppDispatch,useAppSelector}from"../../store/hooks";import{fetchSinglePlayerAsync,SelectSinglePlayerData}from"../../store/getPlayerSlice";import{BreadCrumbs}from"../../Components/BreadCrumbs/breadCrumbs";import{ControlButtons}from"../../Components/ControlButtons/controlButtons";import{newSelectedId}from"../../store/selectedIdSlice";import{setMenuId}from"../../store/sideMenuSlice";import{useHistory}from"react-router";import{PlayerInfo}from"../../Components/PlayerInfo/playerInfo";import{Sidebar}from"../../Components/Sidebar/sidebar";import{Header}from"../../Components/Header/header";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var Player=function Player(){var dispatch=useAppDispatch();var history=useHistory();var singlePlayer=useAppSelector(SelectSinglePlayerData);var playerId=useAppSelector(newSelectedId);if(playerId===0){history.push("/players");}var request="http://dev.trainee.dex-it.ru/api/Player/Get?id=".concat(playerId);useEffect(function(){dispatch(fetchSinglePlayerAsync(request));dispatch(setMenuId(2));},[request,dispatch]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidebar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"page-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"item bg",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item__wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item__top",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BreadCrumbs,{path:"Players",name:singlePlayer.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ControlButtons,{itemId:singlePlayer.id})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"item__content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PlayerInfo,{})})]})})})]});};
